channel.title: Code Examples on Cedric Bail
channel.description: Recent content in Code Examples on Cedric Bail

item.title: Base64 Decoder - Complete Example
item.description: This is the complete implementation of the base64 decoder discussed in Cross-Lane Communication: When Lanes Need to Talk.

item.title: IPv4 Parser - Complete Example
item.description: This is the complete implementation of the high-performance IPv4 address parser discussed in Putting It All Together: Fast IPv4 Parsing with SPMD Go.
